data.text: @EternalEnglish Yes, exactly.  And a dirty looking little one at that.
@EternalEnglish Oh and yes, not on the side of the government and most of the sheep believing them.
@EternalEnglish See I think I support Ukrainian people but this Zelensky character is just not right, he’s a comedian.  🤷🏼‍♀️
@catalotal All I know is that I'm definitely not on the side of those that support Ukraine.
@Jules12101 @EternalEnglish You’ll get used to me waffling nonsensically, although not usually this early on. 😹
@EternalEnglish Ha ha.  I see what you mean, i just mean I don’t trust the news and nor Russia.
@catalotal I'm not sure that I understand your point.
@EternalEnglish There’s not a lot of footage to back up the claims so it’s hard to think you may have an opinion.  Except look at the state of Russia and think of history, that alone is enough maybe?
